_comment: Performance baselines for SRFM C++ library. Generated on 2026-03-01.

beta_compute_1M.description: BetaCalculator::fromPriceVelocityOnline on 1M price bars (2 prices each)
beta_compute_1M.notes: Dominated by log() and tanh() calls. Should be < 200 ns/op.

gamma_compute_1M.notes: Single sqrt() call. Should be < 15 ns/op.

full_pipeline_1M.notes: Full stack: parse → beta → manifold → geodesic (10 steps) → signal.

christoffel_compute.notes: 64 symbol loop, O(DIM^3) = O(64). Should be < 100 ns.

rk4_geodesic_100steps.description: GeodesicSolver::solve() with 100 RK4 steps in flat spacetime
rk4_geodesic_100steps.notes: 4 RK4 evaluations × 100 steps × DIM^2 Christoffel sums. < 2 µs target.

rapidity_1M.notes: Single atanh() call. Should be < 20 ns/op.

compose_velocities_1M.notes: Two multiplies + one divide + BetaVelocity::make(). < 10 ns target.
